Good ramen.  Solid!  I am not use to the ramen noodles, they use the thinner kind, but of course, there is more than one kind of ramen noodle.  I got miso, hubby got soja.  Kimchi was good and home made.  Also for dessert, they had taro ice cream.  We really didn't expect to eat ramen in Barcelona, but happy we found a place and would definitely return.  It's almost as good as what you find in the bay area in California.
